docs.lead_paragraph: The soprano Jolle Greenleaf persevered through illness and other obstacles to mark the 400th anniversary of Monteverdi’s Vespers early this year. Now she and her group are reprising that performance.

headline.main: Vespers Born of Determination and Joy
headline.print_headline: Vespers Born of Determination and Joy

docs.snippet: The soprano Jolle Greenleaf persevered through illness and other obstacles to mark the 400th anniversary of Monteverdi’s Vespers early this year. Now she and her group are reprising that performance.

docs.lead_paragraph: “Large, amiable Greg Kilgore clearly retains a sense of wonder about what he does.”

docs.lead_paragraph: Irish law prohibits all abortions except those necessary to save a woman's life, and as a practical matter it imposes daunting obstacles to terminating life-threatening pregnancies as well. In a secularized Europe, Ireland is noticeably out of step. Of the 47 countries covered by the European Convention on Human Rights, only in the fairytale countries of Andorra, Malta and San Marino, where all abortions are illegal, is the law any stricter.
docs.abstract: A European court's decision on abortion, and its parallels to the United States.
docs.snippet: A European court's decision on abortion, and its parallels to the United States.

docs.lead_paragraph: Slowly but surely, Cambodia's visual art scene has come out from behind the shadow of the Pol Pot era.

headline.main: Cambodian Art Emerges From Horrors of a Murderous Past
headline.print_headline: Cambodian Art Emerges From Horrors of a Murderous Past

docs.snippet: Slowly but surely, Cambodia's visual art scene has come out from behind the shadow of the Pol Pot era.

docs.lead_paragraph: Earlier today I ended an update with the story of a mother who had wondered how she could possibly love her second child as much as she did her first. She wrote asking Motherlode readers for advice, and you gave it. You told her it would be fine, and she listened, and it was.
docs.abstract: You gave readers advice. Even when it surprised them, they heard you.
docs.snippet: You gave readers advice. Even when it surprised them, they heard you.
